query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.createdBy,
       GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT pm.userId) as userIds,
       COUNT(DISTINCT pm.userId) as uniqueMembers
FROM projects p
LEFT JOIN projectMembers pm ON p.id = pm.projectId
WHERE p.archivedAt IS NULL
GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.createdBy
ORDER BY p.id;

       COUNT(DISTINCT pm.userId) as uniqueMembers

LEFT JOIN projectMembers pm ON p.id = pm.projectId
WHERE p.archivedAt IS NULL
GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.createdBy
ORDER BY p.id;
